title: EXCLUSIVE PICS: Baby Adira's day out with dad Aditya Chopra : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
EXCLUSIVE PICS: Baby Adira's day out with dad Aditya Chopra Aditya Chopra was spotted with daughter Adira in Mumbai. IndiaToday.in | Written by Charu Thakur A + A - Adira with Aditya Chopra 
Aditya Chopra is known to be a private person. The filmmaker is hardly spotted in public. But he made an exception for his darling daughter Adira. The father-daughter duo was recently spotted in Mumbai, and the paparazzi went berserk. 
After keeping her away from the prying eyes, Rani Mukerji shared the first picture of Adira on her birthday in December last year. In a heartfelt note shared along with the picture, Rani said she will always encourage her little bundle of joy to follow her heart and be carefree. 
She added, "I hope I can bring Adira beautifully...Without any fears, brave, wise, clever, disciplined, well mannered. I want everyone to be proud of her. Even if nobody is...I will always be proud of her...Encourage her to follow her heart....Not get bullied ever...Not to be pressurised for anything in life. Be carefree always." 
The actress said she is in the most beautiful phase of her life and becoming mother has helped her in evolving as a human being. 
And now the doting dad's day out with baby Adira was captured by the paparazzi. Adorable Adira was seen wrapped around Adi's arms as the two were spotted in Mumbai. 
Adi took out time from his busy schedule to spend time with his daughter. 
(Photos: Milind Shelte)
